item.title: Re: with 1 compile error please
item.dc:creator: @puresdeath puresdeath
item.description:
@puresdeath wrote:

this is the stuff above the auto cast

[code] if (spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell)
{
if (playerLevel[6] > 94) {
if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 0) == false)
|| (playerHasItemAmount(565, 0) == false)
|| (playerHasItemAmount(555, 0) == false)) {
sendMessage(
“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
sendMessage(
"You need 40 " + getItemName(560) + ", 40 "
+ getItemName(565) + " and 60 "
+ getItemName(555));
} else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 0) == true)
&& (playerHasItemAmount(565, 0) == true)
&& (playerHasItemAmount(554, 0) == true)) {
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25);
startAnimation(1979);
castOnPlayer.uberentangle();
castOnPlayer.inCombat();
inCombat();
stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
// stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
// castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
castOnPlayer.sendMessage(“You have been frozen!”);
sendMessage(“You poison and freeze the enemy!”);
deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 0);
deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 0);
deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 0);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
}
} else if (playerLevel[6] <= 93) {
sendMessage(
“You need a magic level of 94 to cast this FUCKING spell!”);
}
}

        if (spellID == 1156) // Earth Strike Owner Strike Owner Spell (Owner only)
        {
            if (playerRights <= 100) {
                sendMessage("You need Owner priveleges to cast this spell!");
            } else if (playerRights >= 3) {
                startAnimation(1914);
                hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(65);
                castOnPlayer.inCombat();
                castOnPlayer.Teleblock();
                castOnPlayer.burst();
                inCombat();
                actionTimer = 10;
                stillgfx(292, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
                stillgfx(292, castOnPlayer.absY - 1, castOnPlayer.absX);
                stillgfx(292, castOnPlayer.absY + 1, castOnPlayer.absX);
                stillgfx(292, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX - 1);
                stillgfx(292, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX + 1);
                stillgfx(311, absY, absX);
                stillgfx(287, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
                castOnPlayer.stillgfx(305, castOnPlayer.absY,
                        castOnPlayer.absX);
                castOnPlayer.sendMessage("PWNT!!");
                deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 0);
                deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 0);
                deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(555), 0);
                teleportToX = absX;
                teleportToY = absY;
            } else if (playerLevel[6] <= 1) {
                sendMessage("You need to be Owner to cast this spell!");
            }
        }

[/code]

item.title: Re: with 1 compile error please
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

try this

        public void iceBarrage() 
        {
		if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675)  //Auto Ice Barrage
		{
			TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
			//iceBarrage();
			animation(441, EnemyY, EnemyX);
			AnimationReset = true; 
    			updateRequired = true;
    			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			actionAmount++;
			teleportToX = absX;   
 			teleportToY = absY; 
 			hitDiff = 29 + misc.random(2);
 			actionTimer = 2;
 			setAnimation(1979);
			AnimationReset = true;
			server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff;
			server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff;
			server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true;
			server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true;
			double TotalExp = 0;
			TotalExp = (double)(30000 * hitDiff);
			TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
			addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerMagic);
			if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0)
			{
				hitDiff = EnemyHP;
			}
		}
	}

methods have to have be words without spaces
you needed to remove a bracket and put if instead of else if
your indenting was off
commented out iceBarrage(); because you will cause a problem with looping and can cause your server to crash

Read full topic
